@1@ Public member function, calls the member function {{tt|do_thousands_sep}} of the most derived class.

@2@ Returns the character to be used as the separator between digit groups when parsing or formatting the integral parts of monetary values. 

===Return value===
The object of type {{tt|char_type}} to use as the thousands separator. In common U.S. locales, this is {{c|','}} or {{c|L','}}.
